analysis.description:
AtlantBuyer.fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#95-110) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(this.balance == 0)

Reentrancy in AtlantBuyer.personal_withdraw (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#37-57):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#45-46)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#50-51)

Reentrancy in AtlantBuyer.withdraw_token (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#61-81):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = myToken.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#71-72)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#76)

Reentrancy in AtlantBuyer.personal_withdraw (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#37-57):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#45-46)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contract_eth_value (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#49-50)

Reentrancy in AtlantBuyer.withdraw_token (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#61-81):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = myToken.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#71-72)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- contract_eth_value (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#74-75)

AtlantBuyer.developer should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#20-21)
AtlantBuyer.eth_minimum should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#23-25)
AtlantBuyer.password_hash should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#19-20)
AtlantBuyer.sale should be constant (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#21-22)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#32-35:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_token' of AtlantBuyer.set_token (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#26) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_token' of AtlantBuyer.withdraw_token (/unique_chucks/19/0x8a92d6eb9a7360c651ddcc69b3c6e01d82c90bd4.sol#62) is not in mixedCase
